待兼鰐: (マチカネワニ) - Toyotamaphimeia machikanensis (Japanese fossil species of crocodilian)
待受画像: (まちうけがぞう) - stand by image (on mobile phones)
待受画面: (まちうけがめん) - standby screen; standby display
待合: (まちあい) - meeting place/assignation place; geisha entertaining room/teahouse/machiai
待合い: (まちあい) - meeting place/assignation place; geisha entertaining room/teahouse/machiai
待合所: (まちあいじょ) - shelter (for buses)/waiting area; waiting room
待合政治: (まちあいせいじ) - (yoji) back-room political dealing
待合茶屋: (まちあいぢゃや) - meeting place for assignations, drinking, etc.
待宵: (まつよい) - night where one waits for someone who is supposed to come; night of the 14th day of the eight month of the lunar calendar
待宵草: (まつよいぐさ) - evening primrose (esp. Chilean evening primrose, Oenothera stricta)
待期療法: (たいきりょうほう) - palliative treatment
待期者: (たいきしゃ) - deferred pensioner; retired person who is not yet old enough to receive their pension
待機: (たいき) - alert; standby; await an opportunity; wait for orders
待機児童: (たいきじどう) - child on waiting list (kindergarten, school, etc.)
待設ける: (まちもうける) - to expect; to look for; to look forward to; to anticipate; to wait for
待遇: (taiguu) - tratamento, recepção, serviço; condições de trabalho, salário, remuneração
待遇改善: (たいぐうかいぜん) - (yoji) improvement of labor conditions (labour)
待遇表現: (たいぐうひょうげん) - attitudinal expression (indicating the speaker's respect, contempt, etc. for the listener or the person being discussed)
待遠しい: (まちどおしい) - looking forward to; anxiously awaited
待避壕: (たいひごう) - bomb shelter; dugout; trench
待避線: (たいひせん) - a sidetrack; a turnout
待雪草: (マツユキソウ) - snowdrop (Galanthus nivalis); snow-flower
律: (ritsu) - law , law (especialmente o código penal antigo da Ásia Oriental), regulation; vinaya (rules for the monastic community); (musical) pitch; six odd-numbered notes of the ancient chromatic scale
律々しい: (りりしい) - gallant; brave; imposing; awe-inspiring; severe; biting; chivalrous; manly; dignified
律する: (りっする) - to judge (on the basis of); to control/to discipline (oneself)/to regulate
律令: (りつれい) - criminal, administrative and civil codes (forming the basis of ancient East Asian law; orig. Chinese); legal codes of the Nara and Heian eras based on Chinese models
律令制: (りつりょうせい) - ritsuryo system (ancient East Asian system of centralized governance; in Japan: esp. 7th-10th century)
律令国家: (りつりょうこっか) - the Japanese nation under the ritsuryo codes
律令時代: (りつりょうじだい) - ritsuryo period (mid 7th-10th centuries CE)
律令格式: (りつりょうきゃくしき) - codes of laws and ethics (T'ang Code)
律儀者: (りちぎもの) - honest person; conscientious person
律呂: (りつりょ) - standard tones; Chinese system of musical sounds
律律しい: (りりしい) - gallant; brave; imposing; awe-inspiring; severe; biting; chivalrous; manly; dignified
律旋: (りっせん) - Japanese seven-tone gagaku scale (corresponding to: re, mi, fa, so, la, ti, do, i.e. the Dorian mode)
律旋法: (りっせんぽう) - Japanese seven-tone gagaku scale (corresponding to: re, mi, fa, so, la, ti, do) similar to Dorian mode
律法: (りっぽう) - law/rule/commandment; the Torah (the law of God as revealed to Moses)
律法学者: (りっぽうがくしゃ) - rabbi; scribe (Biblical)
律管: (りっかん) - ancient Chinese pitch pipe (12 pipes corresponding to the ancient Chinese chromatic scale)
律義者: (りちぎもの) - honest person; conscientious person
律音階: (りつおんかい) - ritsu scale (anhemitonic pentatonic scale primarily used in gagaku: re, mi, so, la, ti)
後: (cinco/cavalo/depois/vaca/trás/depois) - behind , behind, rear; after, later; after one's death; remainder, the rest
後から後から: (あとからあとから) - one after another; in rapid succession
後がない: (あとがない) - having one's back to the wall; having nowhere to go; having no way out; not having another chance
後が無い: (あとがない) - having one's back to the wall; having nowhere to go; having no way out; not having another chance
後じん: (こうじん) - {anat} metanephros; third stage of kidney development
後ずさる: (あとずさる) - to retreat; to back off; to draw back; to step back; to shrink away
後に: (のちに) - later on; subsequently; by and by; after a while
後にする: (あとにする) - to leave behind; to put off/to postpone
後にも先にも: (あとにもさきにも) - before or since; neither before nor after; no other time in one's life; stressing a particular moment or event as being unique or most extreme
後に倒れる: (うしろにたおれる) - to fall backward
後に引けない: (あとにひけない) - unable to back out; unable to withdraw; unable to stop; unable to compromise
後ねだり: (あとねだり) - demanding again what one has already obtained; coaxing out of someone for a second time
後の世: (のちのよ) - after ages; posterity; future life; the next world
後の月: (のちのつき) - moon of the 13th day of 9th lunar month; leap month
後の月見: (のちのつきみ) - moon-viewing on the 13th day of the 9th lunar month
後の朝: (のちのあさ) - the morning after (having slept together)
後の炭: (のちのすみ) - second adding of charcoal to the fire (tea ceremony)
後は野となれ山となれ: (あとはのとなれやまとなれ) - (proverb) I don't care what follows; the future will take care of itself
後へ引く: (あとへひく) - to retreat; to recede
後へ退く: (あとへひく) - to retreat; to recede
後ほど: (のちほど) - later on; eventually; afterwards
後らす: (おくらす) - to retard; to delay
後らせる: (おくらせる) - to delay; to postpone; to put off; to slow down; to hold up; to retard; to put back (a clock)
後れ: (おくれ) - delay; lag; postponement; falling behind
後ればせながら: (おそればせながら) - belatedly; tardily
後れる: (おくれる) - to be late; to be delayed; to fall behind schedule; to be overdue
後れをとる: (おくれをとる) - to fall behind
後れを取る: (おくれをとる) - to fall behind
後れ馳せながら: (おそればせながら) - belatedly; tardily
